term.title: tele-substitution

item.text: A substitution reaction in which the entering group takes up a position more than one atom away from the atom to which the leaving group was attached:[image: Not defined]

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1172 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)

item.title: Wikipedia - Padróns de substitución en arenos (gl)

Wikipedia - Patrons de substitució en hidrocarburs aromàtics (ca)
Wikipedia - نمط الاستبدال في الحلقات العطرية (ar)
